mapper.insert: insert into SB02 (seq, seq01, text, userid, regdate) values (SEQ_SB02.NEXTVAL, #{seq01}, #{text}, #{userid}, #{regdate})
mapper.select: select S2.* from (select rownum as rown, S.* from (select seq as seq, seq01 as seq01, text as text, userid as userid, regdate as regdate, good as good, count(*) over() as totCnt from SB02 where seq01 = #{seq01} order by regdate desc ) S ) S2 where S2.rown between #{startRownum} + 1 and #{endRownum}
